Interface ColoredPointList

    public interface ColoredPointList
extends PointList

    • Method Detail

      • getPointColor

        Color getPointColor(int index)
        Returns the color of a point.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the point
        Returns:
        the color of the point at the specified index
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of range (index<0 || index>=getPointCount())
